divs: sighting detailsok i hope i not seeing things now this is my second bright star like object i seen zip by this time no flash of light. i was looking at the night sky again coming from walking my dog again i saw a plane which i knew was one since it was blinking and flying then i notice a white bright like star zip past it the plane was higher up then the star like object it passed underneath going in a west\north direction once again i tried to video it with my phone but as soon as i tried it just disappered.i know what planes and helicopters,jets or shooting stars look like this was not either one of them...
Summary: 2nd Bright like star within a week
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in South Bend
